short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 太联信息驿站可以自动检测、导入候选人简历、职位等信息到太联系统。
short.en: Detect and import information such as candidate's CV, jobs, etc. into Talink system

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 太联信息驿站，是一款提升猎头顾问工作效率的Chrome插件，它能够在猎头顾问浏览招聘网站时自动识别候选人简历、检查重复联系方式简历、分析与猎头顾问的简历相似性，方便猎头顾问导入和更新简历。此外，还可以协助talink系统集成猎头顾问所需的信息，让顾问更聪明的工作。
long.en: Talink Sensor, as a tool to improve headhunter/consultant’s efficiency, can detect candidate’s CVs on recruiting websites, find CVs with same contacts, figure out CVs’ similarity in consultant’s CV database, to help consultant import or update his/her database. Even more, this plugin integrates information to Talink system to help consultant work smartly.
